questions.question: What is data protection?
options: A. Storing data in physical files
B. Safeguarding sensitive information from unauthorized access and data breaches
C. Deleting all data from a computer
D. Sharing data with everyone online

questions.question: Which of the following is a best practice for data protection?
options: B. Using strong, unique passwords for each account
C. Storing all data on a public server

questions.question: How can you protect sensitive data on a public Wi-Fi network?
options: B. Using a VPN (Virtual Private Network)
C. Sharing all personal data openly

questions.question: What should you do if you suspect a data breach?
options: A. Ignore it and hope for the best
B. Immediately inform the appropriate authorities or IT department
C. Share the information on social media
D. Delete all related files and logs
